title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
sburjan` - (00:02): did you commit the other test I attached to JIRA ?  
sdumitriu - (00:04): No, I was looking at it right now  
sdumitriu - (00:04): Some remarks  
sburjan` - (00:05): shoot  
sdumitriu - (00:05): It's not that good to hardcode URLs  
sdumitriu - (00:05): By.xpath("//span[@class='edit\_section']/a[@href='/xwiki/bin/edit/Sandbox/WebHome?section="  
lpereira left at 00:05 (Quit: Leaving.  
sburjan` - (00:05): i know, but this is why I chose a space bundled by default  
sdumitriu - (00:06): Either use getURL + ?section=, or use [@href$='section=  
sburjan` - (00:06): okay. stored  
sdumitriu - (00:06): It's not the space that's the problem  
sdumitriu - (00:06): /bin/edit/ is the problem  
sdumitriu - (00:07): I'm planning on removing /bin/ soon  
sdumitriu - (00:07): So all these URLs will be broken  
sdumitriu - (00:07): It's Sandbox, not SandBox  
sburjan` - (00:08): I used SandBox in test name, but in URL's i used it Sandbox  
sdumitriu - (00:08): It shouldn't extend EditPage, since the sandbox page can both be viewed and edited  
sdumitriu - (00:09): So it would make sense to do new SandboxPage().gotoPage and expect to be on the view mode  
sburjan` - (00:09): yeah, I had some difficulties there... it should extend BasePage, right ?  
sburjan` - (00:09): don't have the classes here  
sdumitriu - (00:09): Tough question  
sburjan` - (00:09): nor any IDE  
sburjan` - (00:11): I could have simply edit the main page  
sburjan` - (00:11): it would have been much simpler  
sdumitriu - (00:12): Yeah  
sdumitriu - (00:13): But I don't know if it has sections  
sdumitriu - (00:13): No, it doesn't  
sburjan` - (00:13): but since these tests are unstopable, didn't want to mess the platform and destroy it for the tests that came next  
sburjan` - (00:13): yeah .. sandbox is a classical example of page with lots of sections  
sburjan` - (00:21): if you have more remarks please do tell  
sdumitriu - (00:22): Again, you forgot the copyright header  
sburjan` - (00:25): yeah.. sorry  
sburjan` - (00:30): are you gonna commit them today, or monday ?  
sdumitriu - (00:39): Not today  
sburjan` - (00:49): okay  
sburjan` - (00:49): I'm going to sleep then  
sdumitriu - (00:49): Good night  
sburjan` - (00:56): good night sdumitriu  
MartinCleaver joined #xwiki at 01:32  
MartinCleaver left at 01:32 (Client Quit  
abusenius left at 01:43 (Ping timeout: 272 seconds  
sdumitriu left at 02:48 (Ping timeout: 276 seconds  
Lukemon left at 03:37 (Quit: Make it idiot proof and someone will make a better idiot.  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 07:32  
florinciu left at 07:51 (Read error: Connection reset by peer  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 07:59  
vmassol left at 08:34 (Quit: Leaving.  
lpereira joined #xwiki at 08:56  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 09:30  
vmassol1 joined #xwiki at 09:31  
vmassol left at 09:31 (Read error: Connection reset by peer  
vmassol1 left at 10:07 (Quit: Leaving.  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 11:03  
lucaa left at 11:43 (Ping timeout: 276 seconds  
abusenius joined #xwiki at 11:50  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 11:53  
sburjan` - (11:54): hello sdumitriu  
sdumitriu - (11:57): Hi sburjan`  
sdumitriu - (12:12): Hi sburjan`  
lucaa joined #xwiki at 12:15  
mflorea joined #xwiki at 12:21  
lucaa left at 12:25 (Ping timeout: 272 seconds  
sburjan` - (12:28): hello sdumitriu :)  
sdumitriu - (12:33): cjdelisle: Around?  
sburjan` - (12:34): no  
sburjan` - (12:34): he's left for the weekend  
sburjan` - (12:34): [22:37] (cjdelisle): I'm going to be gone tomorrow and sunday in case anyone asks.  
sdumitriu - (12:35): K  
lucaa joined #xwiki at 13:15  
cjdelisle - (13:34): sdumitriu: I'm here right now but leaving soon.  
cjdelisle - (13:43): There is one more small attachment bug. When you attach multiple files at the same time, the first file's version is incremented while the second file saves. It's a little mistake in the UploadAction, I'll definitely have time to fix sunday or monday.  
lucaa left at 13:44 (Quit: Leaving.  
abusenius left at 13:44 (Read error: Operation timed out  
abusenius joined #xwiki at 13:46  
florinciu left at 13:49 (Quit: Leaving.  
sdumitriu left at 13:59 (Ping timeout: 276 seconds  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 14:46  
sburjan` - (14:47): cjdelisle OKAY  
sburjan` - (14:47): sorry for the caps  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 15:58  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 16:21  
sdumitriu - (20:22): cjdelisle: When you've got some time, tell me what you think about http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XE-702  
abusenius - (21:53): sdumitriu: imo sort should be limited to those 5 possible values or at least [a-zA-Z0-9\_.]+  
abusenius - (21:54): because it is not quoted  
sdumitriu - (21:56): Yes, indeed  
Enygma` joined #xwiki at 22:01  
abusenius - (22:19): sdumitriu: do you know if somebody is using the "stable" rights administration interface?  
abusenius - (22:19): it defaults to "new" since 1.2  
sdumitriu - (22:19): Nobody I know  
sdumitriu - (22:20): Ask Ludovic, he knows the older users  
abusenius - (22:20): ok  
abusenius - (22:21): old interface has security issues  
abusenius - (22:26): another question about old code, why does web/standard/\*\*/editmodes.vm has those if-s about $sectionNumber?  
abusenius - (22:26): it is not used anywhere as far as I can grep  
florinciu left at 22:29 (Ping timeout: 240 seconds  
sdumitriu - (22:31): Probably some leftovers  
abusenius - (22:51): ah, it is put into the velocity context in EditAction, nice  
mflorea left at 22:59 (Quit: Leaving.
